summary: Skyrim Spells Restored (SSR) adds currently 111 new spell tomes with about 40 effects from previous games to Skyrim. Further, spell magnitude will scale with skill level.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Skyrim\'s Spells Restored
Version 1.2 beta[/size]

========================

[color=#ff0000][size=5][b]WARNING

Before using this mod, make a new save. Unequip all items and let all potion durations expire. A change in active magic effects can damage your character permanently!

If you want to use this mod with an existing save file, use the version without changes to the skill system.[/b][/size][/color]

=======================

[size=5]Description[/size]

SSR adds (currently) 108 new spell tomes with about 40 new effects to Skyrim. Most spells are Apprentice level and can be purchased from any NPC that sells Apprentice tomes.
Further, some changes to the magic system itself (not included in the optional file):

	* All spells scale with their skill level, for double magnitude at skill level 100
	* All Fortify Skill enchanments and potions increase skill level directly
	* All enchantments and potions had their magic schools removed (to prevent increase with skill level)

=======================

[size=5]Installation[/size]

Copy the files into your Skyrim\\Data folder, and select Skyrim Spells Restored.esp in the Skyrim Launcher.
From version 1.2 on, SSR won\'t use a *.bsa. If you have an old one, delete it and copy the Scripts folder into your Skyrim\\Data folder.

=======================

[size=5]Change Log[/size]

Version 1.2 beta
- Changed several enchantment effects not to scale with magic schools
- Diseases don\'t scale with Restoration level anymore
- Fists of Steel Perk doesn\'t scale with Alteration anymore
- Fixed a wrong global value
- Fixed summoned Corrupted Shade being invulnerable to attacks
- Decreased spells\' contribution to skill leveling (from 1.0 to 0.15)
- Increased Poison Spell\'s duration and magicka cost and decreased magnitude
- Added three new tomes: Restore Health, Magicka and Stamina
- Altars can now cure Damage Attribute/Skill effects applied by NPCs (this would require another mod such as Automatic Spells)

Version 1.1 beta
- Most spells should increase their respective skill level now. [color=#ff0000]However, this is not balanced at all yet![/color]
- Drain Restoration spell now correctly drains the Restoration skill, not Pickpocket
- Restoration Master spell tomes now give the correct spell
- Fixed Old Knocker\'s magicka cost
- Command Animal and Command Humanoid have been changed to aimed spells
- Duration of Fortify Skill/Attribute spells has been doubled
- Duration of Resist Magic/Element/Poison spells has been trippled
- Magnitude of Resist Magic spells has been cut in half
- Beggar\'s Nose has a different visual effect to distinguish it better form Detect Life
- Added Drain Destruction to sold spell tomes
- Removed many spell tomes from merchants (undesireable Drain spells, several Fortify spells, most \"on target\" spells). Those have to be found in loot now
- Added three new Expert Destruction spells: Scourge Blade (Drains One-Handed and Two-Handed), Dwindling Barrier (Drains Light & Heavy Armor as well as Block) and Hand of Azaran (Drains Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction and Restoration)

=======================

[size=5]Spell List[/size]

Alteration
=====================
Apprentice:
Burden
Beggar\'s Nose (Detect Gold)
Feather
Feather on Target
Fire Shield
Frost Shield
Shock Shield
Reflect
Stoneflesh Target
Spell Absorption
Spell Absorption on Target

=====================
Apprentice:
Absorb Health
Absorb Magicka
Absorb Stamina
Disintegrate Armor
Disintegrate Weapon
Drain Health
Drain Magicka
Drain Stamina
Drain Alchemy
Drain Alteration
Drain Archery
Drain Block
Drain Conjuration
Drain Destruction
Drain Enchanting

Drain Illusion
Drain Light Armor
Drain Lockpicking

Drain Pickpocket
Drain Restoration
Drain Smithing
Drain Sneak
Drain Speech
Drain Two-Handed
Poison
Weakness to Disease
Weakness to Poison
Weakness to Fire
Weakness to Frost
Weakness to Magic
Weakness to Shock
Expert:
Atmoran Summer
Cloudruler
Dwindling Barrier
Hand of Azaran
Old Knocker
Scourge Blade
Sun\'s Death

Conjuration
=====================
Apprentice:
Command Animal
Command Humanoid
Summon Skeleton Archer
Summon Skeleton Guard
Summon Skeleton Warrior
Adept:
Command Undead
Summon Draugr Scourge
Summon Corrupted Shade
Expert:
Summon Draugr Deathlord
Master:
Shor\'s Bones


Illusion
=====================
Apprentice:
Blind
Charm
Night Eye
Sanctuary
Silence
Expert:
Voice of the Windcaller


Restoration
=====================
Cure Disease
Cure Disease on Target
Cure Poison
Dispel
Dispel on Target
Fortify Health
Fortify Magicka 
Fortify Stamina
Fortify Speed
Fortify Health on Target
Fortify Magicka on Target
Fortify Stamina on Target
Fortify Speed on Target
Fortify Alchemy
Fortify Alteration
Fortify Archery
Fortify Block
Fortify Conjuration
Fortify Destruction
Fortify Enchanting
Fortify Heavy Armor
Fortify Illusion
Fortify Light Armor
Fortify Lockpicking
Fortify One-Handed
Fortify Pickpocket
Fortify Restoration
Fortify Smithing
Fortify Sneak
Fortify Speech
Fortify Two-Handed
Resist Disease
Resist Poison
Resist Magicka
Resist Magicka on Target
Resist Fire
Resist Fire on Target
Resist Frost
Resist Frost on Target
Resist Shock
Resist Shock on Target
Master:
Jhunal\'s Counsel
Tsun\'s Last Stand
Wings of Kyne

Currently not included:
=====================
[color=#ff0000]Jump
Levitate
Open
Lock
Slowfall
Swiftswim
Waterwalking
Chameleon
Damage Attribute/Skill
Restore Attribute/Skill[/color]

For Mark & Recall and Bound Weapon/Armor mods, search skyrimnexus.com. There are good mods available already!

=====================

Remember, this is a beta version. Not all effects will function properly.
Testing and feedback is very welcome!
